existing_features.title: Add an in-app UI that lets the user enter, save, and clear the Replicate API token used for voice conversion (instead of requiring only `VITE_REPLICATE_API_TOKEN` in `.env`).
Persist the Replicate API token on the client and update the voice conversion pipeline to use the stored token at runtime, with `import.meta.env.VITE_REPLICATE_API_TOKEN` as a fallback.
Add a token validation check in the token UI so the user can confirm whether the pasted token is valid before running a conversion.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow users to upload/configure an API token through the app UI

projectName: Add in-app configuration for Replicate API token
